page.title: 18Caravan Club At Notgrove
page.content:
Just off the A436 is a secluded, private Holiday Caravan Club Site. It can accommodate up to 60 vans at a time. There are showers, toilets and a hook-up electric point,as well as an on site shop. It is housed on the site of the now dismantled Notgrove railway station, and is screened from the road by trees.
The nearest hospital is Bourton-on-the Water 6km away, as is the dentist and also the doctors surgery. The doctors are good and will visit at home if the patients find it difficult to reach the surgery. The nearest ambulance is 8km away at Northleach as is the nearest fire station.
